page.title: 06Religion In Inverbervie
page.content: The three churches in our D block are all in Inverbervie. Miss Philp the Minister holds services here every Sunday morning. This church also runs a{Sunday School} for younger children and a{Sunday {Morning Club}for those over eleven. Also attached to this church are a {Woman's Guild}and a{Young Woman's {Group. } Close by the Church of Scotland is the {Gospel Hall.}Here there are services on Sunday mornings and evenings with Sunday School in the afternoon. On Wednesday there is a prayer meeting and bible study and on Friday evenings there is a Happy Hour. In Victoria Terrace stands{St. Davids} {Episcopal Church}where weekly Sunday Services are held. The increasing number of{Roman} {Catholics}travel further to worship.
